title: How to use your iPhone’s Face ID with a mask on
content:
Welcome to TNW Basics, a collection of tips, guides, and advice on how to easily get the most out of your gadgets, apps, and other stuff. Apple just released its iOS 15.4 update, which means you can finally unlock your phone through Face ID when you’re wearing a mask. Notably, this feature works only on iPhone 12 and beyond, so if you’ve got an older version, you’re out of luck. But thankfully, in 2020, Apple introduced a feature of quickly bringing up the passcode screen if the iPhone detects a mask. The feature is not turned on by default, and you…

description: With the new iOS 15.4 update, Apple has introduced a new Face ID feature that allows you to unlock iPhones with a mask.
